title: Kangaroos. Part 1 [Greek version]
brief_description: Part one begins with the evolution of the kangaroo, tracing its development into over fifty species, from tree-dwellers to the better-known “Big Red”. The feeding, and mating habits of various species are examined, also birth and development in the pouch are studied
